text: @GovAbbott With increased amount of #COVID19 cases being admitted to hospitals, what are you doing to ensure there are enough hospital beds for patients in Texas? Better act now or face the fate of NY. You’re being overwhelmed! Start creating makeshift hospitals somewhere BIG! @KPRC2 @KHOU
